interpretation: The "man getting haircut" card symbolizes a time of transformation and self-care. This card suggests that it's time for you to take a step back and reflect on your current situation, and make necessary changes to move forward. This could be a physical transformation, such as changing your appearance or getting a new hairstyle, or it could be an emotional or spiritual transformation. This card encourages you to prioritize your own needs and take care of yourself, both inside and out. Keywords associated with this card include transformation, self-care, reflection, change, and rejuvenation.
